description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, defining the root widget and home page structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the MaterialApp and theme.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the UI with AppBar and body content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, calls runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each widget class.
